name: ChipMOS Technologies Inc.
description: ChipMOS Technologies Inc. is a leading provider of semiconductor testing and packaging services, specializing in the assembly and testing of memory and mixed-signal devices. Founded in 1997 and headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan, ChipMOS serves a diverse range of clients in the electronics industry, including major semiconductor companies and original equipment manufacturers (OEMs). The company offers a comprehensive suite of services that includes die sorting, wafer probing, and final testing, as well as advanced packaging solutions. ChipMOS is recognized for its high-quality standards and innovative technologies, which enable it to deliver reliable and efficient testing and packaging services. It has established a strong presence in the Asia-Pacific region, particularly in Taiwan and China, and continues to expand its capabilities to meet the increasing demands of the semiconductor market. With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, ChipMOS is dedicated to supporting the growth of the technology sector by providing cutting-edge solutions that enhance the performance and reliability of electronic devices.

seo.meta_title: ChipMOS Technologies Inc. | Semiconductor Testing and Packaging Services
seo.meta_description: Learn about ChipMOS Technologies Inc., a leader in semiconductor testing and packaging. Explore our services and commitment to innovation in the electronics industry.

faq.question: What services does ChipMOS provide?
faq.answer: ChipMOS provides semiconductor testing and packaging services, including memory testing and mixed-signal testing.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of ChipMOS?
faq.answer: Tzu-Chi Chen is the CEO of ChipMOS Technologies Inc.

faq.question: Where is ChipMOS headquartered?
faq.answer: ChipMOS is headquartered in Hsinchu, Taiwan.
